text: The Diocese of Treia (Latin: Dioecesis Triensis) was a Roman Catholic diocese located in the town of Treia in the province of Macerata in the central Marche (Italy). In 1920, it was united with the Diocese of San Severino-Marche to form the Diocese of San Severino-Treia."Diocese of Treia" Catholic- Hierarchy.org. David M. Cheney. Retrieved August 25, 2016"Diocese of Treia" GCatholic.org. Gabriel Chow. Retrieved August 25, 2016 ==References== Category:Former Roman Catholic dioceses in Italy
title: Roman Catholic Diocese of Treia
